properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17, DNC 18.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
F/V SCOTIA PROVIDER, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
ABANDONING SHIP IN 43-06.8N 067-30.3W AT 201645Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON,
PHONE: 617 223 8555, E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
